title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Nov 29 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Nov 29 2021
description:
Alex Berenson returns to discuss all the hoopla about the South African Omicron variant, but how this is really just another Pandemic Monday, is Fauci "science," and why are we closing schools? Berenson talked about his new book, Pandemia: How Coronavirus Hysteria Took Over Our Government, Rights, and Lives, being published tomorrow: "One thing I write about in Pandemia. The scientists shouldn't be in charge. It is not their role, and we've sort of forgotten that." How does all this end, when do we go back to normal? LAPD Consultant Deon Joseph: We need teeth in the law. Organized retail thefts continue over Thanksgiving weekend. CNN ignores racist driver, blames Waukesha parade attack, that killed six, on "a car" that drove through parade. What is the difference between a Trump travel ban and a Biden travel ban? According to the left, racism.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
